ItemType.name: basic servicing system
ItemType.description: The basic servicing system, standardized several hundred years ago, is a set of manually controlled arms that attach to a ship's hull and repair any damaged armor up to technology level VI.

ItemType.name: regenerating-nanomachine generator
ItemType.description: This device generates nanomachines and uses your ship's computer to direct them to automatically repair any damaged armor up to technology level XI.

ItemType.name: auto-repair VI
ItemType.description: This VI generates nanomachines and utilizes a built-in quantum CPU to direct them to automatically repair any damaged armor up to technology level XIII.

ItemType.name: auto-repair AI
ItemType.description: This AI generates nanomachines and utilizes a built-in quantum CPUs that automatically repair any damaged armor up to technology level XV.

ItemType.name: Replicator Collective
ItemType.attributes: Alien; cabbageCorp; Illegal; MajorItem; QuantumCPU; Specialty
ItemType.description: These sentient alien nanomachines automatically repair any damaged armor up to technology level XVIII. They do this because they like to, not because you tell them to.
